person.persName: Phillip Marcum (Jackson County, Kentucky, surveyor, farmer, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, surveyor, farmer, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mahaly Asher Marcum. Father of William Marcum, Belvins Marcum, Rebecca Jane Marcum, Thomas W. Marcum, and James Marcum. Surveyor in Jackson County in 1860. Farmer in Jackson County in 1863. Justice of the pace in Jackson County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jackson County, McKee, p. 26-27; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Jackson County, KY, May 1863, p. 109 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
